description: Docker - container platform for building, shipping, and running applications

common_errors.pattern: Cannot connect to the Docker daemon
common_errors.regex: (?i)cannot connect to.*docker daemon|docker daemon.*not running|Is the docker daemon running
common_errors.solution: Start Docker daemon with 'sudo systemctl start docker' or start Docker Desktop

common_errors.cause: User does not have permission to access Docker socket
common_errors.solution: Add user to docker group: 'sudo usermod -aG docker $USER' and re-login

common_errors.regex: (?i)image.*not found|Unable to find image|no such image|manifest unknown
common_errors.cause: Specified image does not exist locally or in registry
common_errors.solution: Verify image name and tag, run 'docker pull' first, check registry authentication

common_errors.cause: Host port is already in use by another process
common_errors.solution: Use a different port with -p flag, or stop the conflicting container/process

common_errors.regex: (?i)no space left|disk.*full|out of.*space|failed to register layer
common_errors.solution: Run 'docker system prune' to remove unused data, increase Docker disk allocation
Check Dockerfile syntax, verify source files exist, review the failed instruction output
List networks with 'docker network ls', create or remove networks as needed

common_errors.cause: Volume mount path issue or permission denied
common_errors.solution: Verify host path exists, check Docker Desktop file sharing settings, use absolute paths

common_errors.cause: Container with the same name already exists
common_errors.solution: Remove existing container with 'docker rm' or use a different name
Run 'docker login' with appropriate credentials for the registry

common_errors.cause: Container exceeded memory limit and was killed
common_errors.solution: Increase container memory limit with --memory flag, optimize application memory usage
Check Dockerfile syntax, ensure instructions are uppercase, verify COPY/ADD paths
